summary:
My working experience with various Oracle products extends to over 20 years. In the last 15 years I have been working as senior consultant with Oracle Hyperion Products. I was involved in many projects and I have participated in all phases of the projects: analysis, design, implementation, roll-out and user training. The main Hyperion Products that I have used are: Hyperion Planning, Hyperion Essbase, Hyperion Essbase Integration Services, Hyperion Analyzer/Web Analysis, Hyperion Reports/Financial Reporting, Hyperion Application Link, Oracle Data Integrator, Hyperion Foundation and Shared Services (including the System 9 and Oracle EPM 11 versions for these products). 
My abilities as a Hyperion developer and product expert were certified by Oracle in May and June 2009.

I have worked in many integrated teams with some of the greatest consulting companies: HP, IBM, Accenture, CapGemini, KPMG, Deloitte etc. In most of the projects my role was that of Hyperion product expert (design, build Hyperion applications in Planning/Essbase) and responsible for designing and building  relational database data marts (in Oracle or MS SQL Server) used for integration with Oracle Hyperion Products.

In the last years Alexandru developed several projects using Anaplan (application builder, integration with Anaplan API and Anaplan Connect) and thus achieving the Master Anaplanner certification.

#Planning #Budgeting #connectedplanning #anaplan #epm #Sonum #PBCS #Oracle #ODI #Onestream

school.name: Academia de Studii Economice din București

certifications.name: Hyperion Essbase Planning 9.3 Administrator I and II (1Z0-272)

projects.title: Marketing Budget, planning, analytic & measurement (Luxembourg)
projects.description:
Sector: Investment fund

Tasks:
•	Contribute to design and build a model used by Marketing department. The model needed to support the business with the planning of the marketing activities, but also support the business during the execution phase. During the execution phase the spend needed to be approved and it needed to be possible to report on the actual spend.
        The model was special because of the customized approval process with audit reporting and the connection with the different financial systems for actual reporting and accrual creation.  

•	Software: Anaplan, integration with Anaplan API using Python 3.6

contributors.headline: Principal Forecasting at Just Eat Takeaway.com

projects.title: Emerson/VertivCo – Various Applications for Controlling Department, Piove di Sacco(Italy)
projects.description:
Sector: Cooling Industry

Tasks:
•	Design databases for various applications used by Controlling Department of VertivCo Italy (ex Emerson Network Power) for actual monthly closing process and planning applications (P&L, BalanceSheet)
•	Design and build the relational staging area used to integrate the applications
•	Create integration flows for loading data using epmautomate tool
•	Create the calc-scripts and business rules for calculation database
•	Maintenance of applications  
•	Software: Oracle Enterprise Planning and Budgeting Cloud Service (EPBCS), relational database: Oracle 11g

projects.title: Saes Getters – Sales Analysis Application, Lainate(Italy)
projects.description:
Sector: Manufactory

Tasks:
•	Create an information system where it is possible to analyze the sales data, the orders data and forecast data. The instrument fore analysis reports: Analyzer 6.2. The multidimensional database: Hyperion Essbase. The repository for staging area data: Oracle 8.1.7
•	Creation of a staging area in Oracle for the sales, orders and forecast data and metadata which include over 25 tables and views, 3 PL/SQL packages with over 1500 code lines
•	Creation of the model and metaoutlines in Essbase Integration Services which load data and metadata from Oracle in Essbase databases
•	Creation of Hyperion Essbase calc-scripts for the data loaded in Essbase databases
Creation of Hyperion Analyzer reports
